layout: profiles
permalink: /people/
title: team
nav: true
nav_order: 2

# Define categories for organizing people (in display order)
# Profiles are now automatically loaded from individual markdown files in _people/ folder
# Each person's markdown file should include a 'category' field (Faculty, Students, or Alumni)
profile_categories:
  - name: Faculty
  - name: Students
  - name: Alumni
# Note: Profiles are now automatically generated from _people/ collection
# To add a new person, create a markdown file in _people/ with the following fields:
#   - category: (must match one of the categories above: "Faculty", "Students", or "Alumni")
#   - order: (number for ordering within category, e.g., 1, 2, 3...)
#   - name: Full name
#   - title: Position/title (e.g., "PhD Student", "Professor", "Research Scientist")
#   - image: filename in assets/img/ folder (e.g., "people/name.jpg")
#   - image_circular: true or false (makes image circular)
#   - email: Email address (optional)
#   - website: Personal website URL (optional)
#   - scholar: Google Scholar URL (optional)
#   - github: GitHub profile URL (optional)
#   - linkedin: LinkedIn profile URL (optional)
#   - more_info: Additional HTML info (optional)
---
